targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num" FROM "build" WHERE ("job_name" =~ /periodic-tripleo-ci-centos-8.*-baremetal.*/and "type"='rdo') AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Bars represent successful promotions to current-tripleo for master. Default time is the last 2 weeks.

targets.query: select count("repo_hash") as "count", last("repo_hash") as "repo", last("repo_url") as "repo_url" from "dlrn-promotion" where ("release" = 'master' and "name" = 'promoted-components' and "distro" = 'CentOS-8' and "component" = 'baremetal') group by time(24h), *

panels.title: Baremetal promotions
